ruleContent.content:
function decode(){ let v43,v38,dest; let respose = java.get(baseUrl,{"User-Agent": "Mobile"}); let accesskey = String(respose.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(respose.header("keystring")); let content = String(respose.body()); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v9 =0; let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen-1]).charCodeAt(); for(i=0;i v18){ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,(v18-v15)+v15) }else{ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,v17+v15) } let v32 = content.length; if((v6 & 1)!=0){ v38 = content.substring(v32-12,v32) dest = content.substring(0,v32-12) }else{ v38 = content.substring(0,12); dest = content.substring(12,content.length); } let key = java.md5Encode(v43+v38).substring(0,8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0,8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest); return content } if(/jjwxc/.test(baseUrl)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); /"content"/.test(result)?java.setContent(result):java.setContent(decode()); intro=intro!=""?"â—"+intro+"â—
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\nã€ğŸ“¢ä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´ã€‘\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\nç™»å½•åè¯·æ›´æ–°ç›®å½•ï¼Œåˆ·æ–°æ­£æ–‡"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //è¯„è®ºå¼€å¯ let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/è¯„è®º/.test(bbb) || /è¯„è®º/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/è¯„è®º/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/è¯„è®º(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/è¯„è®º(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##ä¸ºè¥é€ æ›´å¥½çš„è¯„è®ºç¯å¢ƒï¼Œè¿‘æœŸç½‘ç«™è¦æ±‚å‘è¯„é¡»è¿›è¡Œå®åè®¤è¯ï¼Œæœªå®åç”¨æˆ·è¯„è®ºæš‚æ—¶ä»…åœ¨å¯¹åº”ä½œè€…åå°åŠå‘è¯„ç”¨æˆ·åå°å¯è§.*|è·å–æ­£æ–‡å¤±è´¥[\s\S]+|â—\s+?â—

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  â˜ª ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/å»ç« èŠ‚åºå·/.test(bbb) || /å»ç« èŠ‚åºå·/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/ç« èŠ‚å/.test(bbb) || /ç« èŠ‚å/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"ç¬¬"+$.chapterid+"ç«  ":'';
}
title=type?'ğŸ“– '+title+' ğŸ“–':title;
if( (/ç›®å½•ç®€ä»‹/.test(bbb) || /ç›®å½•ç®€ä»‹/.test(sss))&&!/ğŸ“–/.test(title)){
	fu = /ç›®å½•ç®€ä»‹ã€(.*?)ã€‘/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/ç›®å½•ç®€ä»‹ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)[1]:sss.match(/ç›®å½•ç®€ä»‹ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[æ­¤ç« èŠ‚å·²é”]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>
